SEARCH
Package de.annalisa.loveletters

Class Game

java.lang.Object
de.annalisa.loveletters.Game
public class Game extends Object
The `Game` class represents a Love Letter card game session. It manages the game flow, player interactions, and scoring.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Initializes a new Love Letter card game session.

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws ExitGameException
      Starts the Love Letter game.
      Throws:
      ExitGameException - to indicate that the Love Letter game should exit or terminate. This exception is used to control the flow of the game and allow players to choose whether to play again or exit the game.

    • getOtherPlayersExcludingCurrent

      public List<Player> getOtherPlayersExcludingCurrent(String currentPlayer)
      Retrieves other players excluding the current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The name of the current player.
      Returns:
      A list of other players.

    • choosePlayerForEffect

      public int choosePlayerForEffect(List<Player> otherPlayers, String message)
      Prompts the current player to choose a player for a game effect from a list of eligible players.
      Parameters:
      otherPlayers - A list of players from which the current player can choose.
      message - The message displayed to instruct the player's choice.
      Returns:
      The index of the chosen player in the 'otherPlayers' list. min 0 - max 3.
      • -1 - Returns -1 if all players are immune.

    • knockOutPlayer

      public void knockOutPlayer(Player player, Player currentPlayer)
      Knocks out a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be knocked out.
      currentPlayer - The current player who is knocking out the other player.

    • getIndexOfCardInHand

      public static int getIndexOfCardInHand(Player player, int closeness)
      Finds the index of a card with a specific closeness value in a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose hand is being searched.
      closeness - The closeness value to search for in the player's hand.
      Returns:
      The index of the first card with the specified closeness value in the player's hand, or -1 if not found.

    • getIndexOfOtherCardOnHand

      public static int getIndexOfOtherCardOnHand(Player player, int closenessOfCardToIgnore)
      Gets the index of the other card in the player's hand, excluding a specific card by closeness.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose hand is being searched.
      closenessOfCardToIgnore - The closeness value of the card to be ignored.
      Returns:
      The index of the other card in the player's hand.

    • isSpecificCardOnHand

      public boolean isSpecificCardOnHand(Player player, int closeness)
      Checks if a player's hand contains a card with a specific closeness value.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose hand is being checked.
      closeness - The closeness value to check for in the player's hand.
      Returns:
      True if the player's hand contains a card with the specified closeness; otherwise false.

    • chooseCardToPlay

      public int chooseCardToPlay(Player player)
      Prompts the player to choose which card to play.
      Parameters:
      player - The player choosing a card to play.
      Returns:
      The index of the chosen card in the player's hand (0 or 1).
